features: Commercial Dustpan with Comb---Our dustpan is about 42.52" tall, and 12.6" wide, so you can pick up a lot of garbage at once with the broom. Our dustpan is equipped with a comb gear, which can be used to remove garbage hair on the broom during the cleaning process.

Commercial Dustpan with Comb---Our dustpan is made of high-quality plastic, which will not be easily damaged and aged, and can be used for a long time. The pole of the dustpan is made of special paint so that it will not rust easily.
Commercial Dustpan with Comb--You can use our dustpan outdoor or indoor, anywhere you like, and it is perfect for courtyard garage lobby mall market floor home kitchen room office pet hair rubbish.
Commercial Dustpan with Comb---Our store has brooms that can be used together with this dustpan. If you need it, you can buy it by yourself.

Commercial Dustpan with Comb---Our Yocada brand is registered and it has large factories to support, so if you encounter any problem while using the product, please feel free to contact our support team. We would sincerely serve you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves my back and combs my broom
reviews.reviewText: Okay, who gets excited about a dustpan? Me, that's who... I really can't help it! I see endless possibilities, this set is truly great!It is made of durable plastic, and stands up on its own. The bucket is large enough to hold more debris than I could imagine ever needing it to and with its tall handle, my back is saved! My favorite feature is the comb, I live in a house with 5 cats, it is REALLY nice to have a comb to lift the dust bunny/fur balls out of my broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes Cleaning Up Easier But Needs Fine Tuning
reviews.reviewText: No doubt you have heard the expression, “Work smarter, not harder”. This dustpan allows you to do just that.What I like about it is…1) It assembles and disassembles quickly in case I want to store it in a smaller space.2) The pan has a wide mouth – 12-1/2” – and is deep – 5” in the front and 3-3/4” in the back – allowing a larger volume of debris to be swept up at one time.3) When in use the handle snaps into place on the pan allowing the pan to remain in contact more easily with the floor/ground.4) The handle quickly and easily disengages from the pan by simply placing your foot on the extreme rear of the pan and lifting up on the handle.5) The pan folds up against the handle which, since I will be keeping it in my garage, helps protect the pan from being accidentally damaged from stepping on it or having heavy objects fall onto it.6) The hanger attachment on the handle allows me to snap a broom onto it.7) The comb that allows me to quickly and easily remove debris that clings to the broom and drop it into the pan in one step.What I dislike about it is…1) The plastic which the pan is made of is of medium weight. It will do the job it was created to do, but I believe its lifespan will be reduced given that it will most likely be used outdoors where it will be subjected to harsher treatment than if used exclusively inside one’s home.2) The hinge that holds the comb assembly to the pan seems to be weaker than it should be and susceptible to breakage or deformation. Again, this is because it is made from a medium weight plastic.3) The price seems a little high, but that is subjective.Overall, this dustpan has much more going for it than against it. In my opinion it just needs a little fine tuning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The broom cleaning feature is great!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know how badly I needed this. No more bending down to pickup dust. Plus the teeth on the edge clean off any pet hair really well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Waste pickup without bending over
reviews.reviewText: I like this dustpan for cleaning the workshop without having to bend down to pick it up. The size of the bucket is great for larger trash items. Dust pail is durable for long service and has a bristle rake on the pail. When your finished cleaning the pail is self standing for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's ok.. I would not call this heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace another dustpan that we use mostly outside for leaves and bigger debris. This Yocada dustpan is inferior to my old one from a different brand. The bucket on the Yocada is smaller, probably half the size, and not as sturdy. The handle on the Yoncada is long and straight. I prefer a handle with an angle at the end as it makes it easier to use, particularly when you are trying to sweep debris into the dustpan.I do like that the Yoncada has a comb at the top front of the bucket to help clean a broom. That is a handy feature.All in all, this is just ok. I think there are better options available at a similar price point.I do not recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The commercial dustpan with comb is a sturdy heavy duty cleaning tool. The dustpan is made tough and built to last. I was getting tired of replacing dustpans when they would bend, break or get lost, so I ordered this powerhouse of a dustpan and I'm happy I did. I don't use the broom cleaner and don't see the point. Just wanted a good dustpan that last with a long comfortable handle and I truly found all that in this heavy duty dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn't call it heavy-duty, but it is a nice size.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: Yocada Heavy Duty Commercial Dustpan with Comb Outdoor Indoor Perfect for Courtyard Garage Lobby Mall Market Floor Home Kitchen Room Office Pet Hair RubbishI received this and put it together a few days ago. The handle is in several pieces that you need to put together.While I haven't swept with it yet, I am pleased with the size of it.I'm using this for a animal foster room that gets messy with hair and litter very fast. You can't run a vacuum in there as it would freak the animals out, so you have to get creative about how to clean thoroughly without a vacuum.This is a nice large size, which is one of the things I really wanted. I'm very pleased with the large size.I like the brush comb that's built into it. It's a nice size and will actually work well, as opposed to some that I've seen that have been more for show and not that functional.It seems to flip easy enough, though I might have more opinions on this later.My only concern is that the handle pieces and the dustpan do not seem heavy duty at all. I really question the longevity of this, to be honest. The quality seems a bit questionable. That's the reason for 4 stars.I will come back and update if anything changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A much needed heavier duty dustpan for our humble abode
reviews.reviewText: Been needing a dustpan especially in a heavy duty version for our downstairs. I like the bright yellow color to help find it easy at home. A good size and weight. Not too heavy. Very easy to use around the home. BONUS is the built-in comb on the dustpan to remove hair and whatever bleh on the broom or brush!! I hate touching the broom or brush to remove the later. Now hands free clean up. NOW i want to clean up more vs before it was a task!!! Now a pleasure.PEACE - LIVE - LIFE - LOVE - LAUGH - PRAY --- PAZ - VIVIR - VIDA - AMOR - RÍER - ORAR
